name: Nix c++ API Wrapper Class
short_description:
Here is a list of header functions.
UnixApi();
    vector<string> pOpen(string cmd); //returns output from a program and stores it in a vector
    string Basename(string file); //returns a file name from exacted from a directory path
    int DeletFile(string file); //deletes a file
    int RemoveDirectory(string path); //removes a directory
    int SymbolicLink(string file, string sLink); //creates a shortcut link
    string Crypt(string Str, string salt); //encrypts a string using a salt
    string GetLogin(); //returns current login name
    string GetPassword(string prompt); //returns a password hiding the characters typed
    int Sleep(int milliseconds); //pause the program for a giving amount of milliseconds
    virtual ~UnixApi();
summary: This is a wrapper class for nix API that simplify API calls
